contents: @疯狂习近平:i can tell you the terrible things that i am being contaminated or brainwashed in some extent. after 27 years being takeover by china, a lot of translated name from foreign matter and most written language is being adapted by china. long ago, i never use my language like this.....................but it is all rest of them i can use. I don't know when it happened............this is one of reason i hate china and chinese people. they destory my mother tongue...........
